entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, mentioned as 'Harry'.

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: A Hippogriff that was sentenced to death by the Ministry, and is being kept safe by Harry.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The wise and shrewd headmaster of Hogwarts, who is waiting for Harry.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl, whose cage he is holding in the other hand.

relationships.description: Harry has decided to keep Buckbeak safe by rechristening him Witherwings.
Dumbledore is waiting for Harry and seems to be supervising his preparations.
Harry owns Hedwig, whose cage he is holding in the other hand.
